Contact me

If you have any suggestions, find a bug or just want to tell me how wonderful this page is, feel free to email me at admoreno@outlook.com ;)

You can also check my other projects at https://github.com/adriem

About this project

This site is not affiliated with OGame nor Gameforge. It is a little project I started to experiment with web technologies. If you have any suggestions or you notice any error, feel free to email me. I will response as soon as I can.

Keep in mind that all the data you enter here is stored locally in your computer. Nobody will have access to it, but you'll have to re-enter it every time you access this page from a new device. I'm working on an import/export option ;)

Hope you enjoy it!
